MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the G75 postcode area of Glasgow. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 11:30am to safely carry out repair work on our underground cable network at Lyttleton and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:22am on Tuesday 26th January 2021
